source:
TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Wrenric has more than his share of concerns, the morale of his men chief among them.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
旅立ちの宿のレンリックは、様子のおかしい同僚に声をかけてほしいようだ。
TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_TODO_02<tab>ガルジェント族の番兵を探す

TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_WRENRIC_000_000<tab>むう……君、ちょっといいか？
頼みたいことがあるんだが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_WRENRIC_000_001<tab>Please keep this to yourself, but one of my men has been acting strangely of late.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_WRENRIC_000_001<tab>近ごろ、様子のおかしい同僚がいてさ。
悩みがあるのか尋ねても、話しづらいみたいで、
何も答えてくれないんだよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_WRENRIC_000_002<tab>As I am sure you can appreciate, there are certain things that the guards here, myself included, may not wish to discuss openly. I had hoped that you, as an outsider, may be able to find out what is troubling him.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_WRENRIC_000_002<tab>もしかしたら、同じ衛兵には言いづらいことかもしれない。
それなら、旅人の君なら話してくれるかも。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_WRENRIC_000_003<tab>He is currently stationed a short distance south from here. If you could lend him your ear, I would be most grateful.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_WRENRIC_000_003<tab>というわけで、「ヒュム族の番兵」に、
声をかけてもらえるかい？
よろしくお願いするよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_WRENRIC_000_010<tab>I will not pretend that our life here is a happy one. We must grasp what scant joy we can.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_WRENRIC_000_010<tab>「ヒュム族の番兵」から話は聞けたかい？
もし悩みを聞くことができたら、彼の力になってやってほしい。
よろしくお願いするよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDA03369_000_020<tab>What brings you all the way out here?
TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDA03369_000_021<tab>So, you've been talking to Wrenric. Well, if you must know, I was thinking about leaving this place.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDA03369_000_021<tab>そうか、レンリックに……。
実はこのあと、旅立ちの宿から逃げようと思っていたんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDA03369_000_022<tab>It was all getting too much for me, and I felt like I was losing my mind one day at a time. Me and one of the others were planning on making a clean break, putting the Inn behind us.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDA03369_000_022<tab>希望がないここに、気持ちが参ってさ。
同僚たちには悪いけど、友人とふたりで、
こっそり行方をくらまそうと考えていたんだよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDA03369_000_023<tab>But after seeing you and Alisaie, I changed my mind. I'm staying here, at least for the time being.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDA03369_000_023<tab>だけど、君とアリゼーは、こんな状況でも前を向いて頑張っている。
それを見てもう少し頑張ろうって、そう思うようになったんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDA03369_000_024<tab>Could you give a message to my friend? He's the one I was going to run away with, a Galdjent chap. I'm not sure exactly where he'll be, but the watchman southeast of the Inn should know.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDA03369_000_024<tab>友人にも、「僕はここに残る」と伝えたい。
……そろそろ、彼と合流をする約束の時間なんだ。
けれど、僕はここでみんなを守る役目を果たしたい。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDA03369_000_025<tab>Tell him that I'm staying. I'd go myself, but I can't abandon my post. Please, I've got to let him know.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDA03369_000_025<tab>悪いけど僕の代わりに、友人に伝言を頼む。
彼の居場所は、旅立ちの宿の南東にいる、
「哨戒任務中の番兵」に聞けばわかるはずだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDA03369_000_030<tab>I can't stand the thought of leaving him there to wait for me. At least if he knows I'm not going, he can make up his own mind about whether to stay or go.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDA03369_000_030<tab>悪いけど僕の代わりに、友人に伝言を頼む。
彼の居場所は、旅立ちの宿の南東にいる、
「哨戒任務中の番兵」に聞けばわかるはずだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDB03369_000_040<tab>Galdjent bloke on patrol? You've just missed him, I'm afraid.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDB03369_000_040<tab>……ヒュム族の番兵の友人を探してるって？
「ガルジェント族の番兵」のことだろ、知ってるぜ。
ちょっと前にここを通りがかったからな。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDB03369_000_041<tab>Said he wanted a breath of fresh air, so he went for a stroll. I tried tellin' him the air's no fresher up there than it is here, but would he listen? Would he bollocks! Anyway, last I saw, he was headin' north.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDB03369_000_041<tab>探している「ガルジェント族の番兵」は、
気分転換の散歩だと言って、北の方へ歩いていったぞ。
しかし、散歩にしては帰りが遅い気がするな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDB03369_000_050<tab>Any luck? Knowin' him, he probably went and strolled right over the side of a cliff or summink.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDB03369_000_050<tab>探している「ガルジェント族の番兵」は、
気分転換の散歩だと言って、北の方へ歩いていったぞ。
しかし、散歩にしては帰りが遅い気がするな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDC03369_000_060<tab>I remember you... One of Alisaie's friends...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDC03369_000_060<tab>あ、ああ、お前は……アリゼーといた……。
ごふっ……いったい、どうしてここに……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDC03369_000_061<tab>Staying? I thought so... That's why I left...by myself. Reckoned I'd get a bit further...before being attacked by...beasts, though. Just my...bloody luck.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDC03369_000_061<tab>そうか……アイツ、残ることにしたんだな……。
なかなか来ないから、怖気づいたのかと……。
だからひとりで逃げて……魔物に襲われて……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDC03369_000_062<tab>Can you tell him...I went alone, that I got away? Wouldn't want him to...blame himself.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDC03369_000_062<tab>なあ、旅人よ……。
アイツに、俺はひとりで去っていったって、
そう伝えてくれ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDC03369_000_063<tab>It's my own fault...he was set on staying...but I talked him into...leaving. I should've listened...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDC03369_000_063<tab>せっかく……決意、したのに……俺のせいで……
鈍らせちゃ……申し訳……。
ああ……いま帰る……かあさ…………

source: TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_SYSTEM_000_070<tab>There's no response. It's just a corpse.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_SYSTEM_000_070<tab>返事がない。
事切れているようだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDA03369_000_080<tab>So, did you give him the message?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDA03369_000_080<tab>ああ、戻ったか。
彼の様子はどうだった？

source: TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_A1_000_001<tab>He left Amh Araeng by himself.
target: TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_A1_000_001<tab>彼はアム・アレーンから去った

source: TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDA03369_000_090<tab>Well, I'm glad he didn't stay on my account. I wouldn't want to hold him back from finding a new life elsewhere.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDA03369_000_090<tab>そうか……いや、それでいいんだ。
僕だって、ついこの間まで逃げようとしていたんだからね……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDA03369_000_100<tab>When you say it like that, it sounds almost as if─ Oh... I see.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDA03369_000_100<tab>そのような悲しげな表情をして、どうした？
もしかして、彼は……いや、言わなくていい……。
大丈夫、察しはついたよ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDA03369_000_111<tab>Still, I stand by my decision. It is the right thing to do, I know it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDA03369_000_111<tab>大切な友人がいなくなってしまったけれど、
それでも、僕はこの旅立ちの宿で頑張るさ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDA03369_000_112<tab>Come to think of it, Wrenric is probably wondering what's going on. If it's not too much to ask, would you mind speaking with him?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_GUARDA03369_000_112<tab>レンリックには、僕から事情を説明しておくけど、
君からも、一言でいいから報告してほしい。
いろいろとありがとう、旅人よ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_WRENRIC_000_120<tab>Is that so? Hmm... It is better than both of them being killed. We should be thankful for small mercies. In any case, I appreciate what you have done for us.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA027_03369_WRENRIC_000_120<tab>……君か。
事情についてはすでに聞いているよ。
ありがとう……これは報酬だ、受け取ってくれ。
